meanings.sent1: I will reemit the signal to make sure it reaches everyone.
meanings.sent2: The radio station will reemit the broadcast at a later time.
meanings.sent3: The fire alarm decided to reemit its loud sound just to annoy us.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter reemitted through the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse reemitted its guiding light, helping ships find their way.

meanings.sent1: Please reemit the email to all team members for clarity.

meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to reemit the ball of yarn to play again.
meanings.sent4: His smile reemitted warmth, making everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent5: The speaker reemitted the music, filling the room with melodies.
